ygData.subject: Re: More Pockets
ygData.msgSnippet: Missed the original message.... I had problems with freezing (some zones where much worse than others. My solution was to UNDERclock my TNT even though it
ygData.messageBody:
Missed the original message.... I had problems with 'freezing' (some
zones where much worse than others. My solution was to UNDERclock my TNT
even though it ran rock solid on other things.



-----Original Message-----
From: Asher [mailto:asher@...]
Sent: Sunday, May 09, 1999 5:43 PM
To: everquest@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] More Pockets


From: Asher <asher@...>

>"Truth has been non-human at other than Freeport doesn't Freeze. Any
others still having this type of problem?"

I don't know what that means but I have not had any problems with the
screen freezing or anything like that.

>"Why doesn't my Wrist pouch and Belt pouch go onto those body
locations?"

The deal with not being able to put your wrist pack on your wrist and
your backpack on your back is a problem. I don't think they are fixing
it because they either don't think it is a gameplay changing issue, or
that is how they want it. In the long run it bennifits you becasue you
can put armor on your wrists and back *and still* carry a backpack,
wrist pack and waistpack.

Kayo lvl 13 monk, Bristlebane
